dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3838123A] Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 14, 2007 9:35 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3838123A] Copyright Violation

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Violation
Added by system at Sunday, Apr 15 2007 02:28 am 
X-MailFrom: xundy@xundy.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sun Apr 15 02:27:56 2007 
Received: (qmail 23450 invoked by alias); 15 Apr 2007 07:27:56 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: (qmail 23447 invoked from network); 15 Apr 2007 07:27:56 -0000 
Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 15 Apr 2007 07:27:56 -0000

DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Sun, 15 Apr 2007 02:27:55 -0500

with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Sun, 15 Apr 2007 02:27:55 -0500

X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi 
X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist:  abuse@ev1servers.net 
Received: from mail.h997779.serverkompetenz.net (h997779.serverkompetenz.net
[85.214.56.251]) 
        by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id D58D983782 
        for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Sun, 15 Apr 2007 02:27:54 -0500 (CDT) 
Received: from [192.168.0.2] (unknown [83.125.40.38]) 
        by mail.h997779.serverkompetenz.net (Postfix) with ESMTP id 4600211812D 
        for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Sun, 15 Apr 2007 09:29:28 +0200 (CEST) 
Message-ID: <4621D401.8040806@xundy.com> 
Date: Sun, 15 Apr 2007 09:28:01 +0200 
From: XundY <xundy@xundy.com> 
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.10 (Windows/20070221) 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
To:  abuse@ev1servers.net 
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright Violation 
Subject: Copyright Violation 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-15; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit 
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0
QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED  
Return-Path: xundy@xundy.com 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Apr 2007 07:27:55.0249 (UTC) FILETIME=[958B8E10:01C77F2F] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
April 15, 2007 
 
 
Sender Information: 
 
X&Y-Scripts 
Kai Maschler 
In den Kaempen 13 
57271 Hilchenbach, Germany 
 
 
Recipient Information: 
Everyones Internet 
 
OrgID:      EVRY 
 
390 Benmar Suite 200 
 
Houston TX 77060, USA 
 
 
 
Sent via: Email 
 
Notice of Copyright Infringement 
 
 
Ladies and Gentlemen: 
 
 
As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital  
Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. Â§Â§512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3)), i place  
you on notice that: 
 
Me, Kai Machler (alias XundY) is the owner of all Copyrights of  
php-Scripts signed with the Name XundY. 
It is not allowed to offer them to download, or pass them to anybody  
without notifying me, because to get them a registration is needed, and  
it's only allowed to download them 
at www.xundy.com. <http://anonym.to/?http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xundy.com.> 
 
Your customer, who held the domain "dbox4.friedhof.ru" offers nearly all  
of my coding projects without my authorization. 
 
Because they are using a forumsoft at( http://dox4.friedhof.ru/board  
)for there doing, i can't give you any further information, by the time  
i write this my account was closed and new registration is switched of. 
 
Under this link http://www.xundy.com/Hacks2.gif  
<http://anonym.to/?http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xundy.com%2Fxundy.gif>  and  
http://www.xundy.com/Hacks1.gif  
<http://anonym.to/?http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xundy.com%2Fxundy.gif> you can see  
two pictures that show Links to download a hole package of my work, e.g   
xundy paket, Megashoutbox 1.32 and [2.3.x] HTAccess-Schutz fÃ¼rs ACP und  
WBB <http://dox4.friedhof.ru/board/showthread.php?t=371>. 
  
 
I'm sorry that i can't provide you with more information but i please  
you to remove or disable all access to the Infringing Material. 
 
It is for sure that the carrier of " dbox4.friedhof.ru " is not allowed  
to offer these things, because he didn't have my authorization. 
 
The information in this Notice of Copyright Infringement is accurate and  
under penalty of perjury. 
 
Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please  
contact me at the address or email address indicated below: 
 
Kai Maschler 
In den Kaempen 13 
57271 Hilchenbach, Germany 
 
Email: xundy@xundy.com <mailto:xundy@xundy.com> 
 
Or       info@xy-scripts.de <mailto:info@xy-scripts.de> 
 
 
 
Regards Kai Maschler 
 
Owner of X&Y-Scripts and XundY-Power-Board
